channel.title: Welcome Sign on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome Sign on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-70 East - Entering Colorado
item.description: Welcome to colorful Colorado on I-70 east. Taken at the Utah-Colorado line.

item.title: I-29 South - Welcome To Iowa
item.description: The People of Iowa Welcome You on I-29 south. At the end of the Big Sioux River bridge at the South Dakota - Iowa state line.

item.title: I-129 West/US-20-West/US-75 South - Welcome To Nebraska
item.description: Welcome To Nebraska on I-129 West/US-20-West/US-75 South. Taken on the bridge over the Missouri River on the Iowa-Nebraska state line.

item.description: Welcome to Iowa on I-29 south in Sioux City.

item.description: Welcome to South Dakota on I-29 north.

item.title: Welcome To Minnesota - MN-60 East
item.description: Welcome To Minnesota on MN-60 East. Taken at the Iowa-Minnesota line. 340th St. where this picture is taken runs along the state line.

item.title: Welcome To Nevada - NV-266 East
item.description: Welcome To Nevada on NV-266 East. Taken at the California - Nevada State Line in the Fish Lake Valley.

item.description: Welcome To California on CA-266 North. Taken at the Nevada-California State line. The mile marker for NV-266 is in the foreground. The state line is at the cattle guard.

item.title: Thanks For Visiting Nevada - NV-266 West
item.description: Thanks For Visiting Nevada at end of NV-266 West. The California welcome sign is visible in the background.

item.description: US-95 South - Welcome To Nevada / Humboldt County Line. Taken at the state line of Nevada and Oregon in McDermitt.

item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-89 North.

item.description: Welcome To Wyoming on WY-414 North. Taken at the Utah-Wyoming Line.

item.description: Welcome To Utah / Daggett County on UT-43. The Wyoming milemarker is in the foreground.

item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-93 South at Lost Trail Pass.

item.description: Welcome To Montana at Lost Trail Pass on US-93 North.

item.description: Entering Anaconda on MT-1 east.

item.title: US-93 North at MT-43 - Lost Trail Pass
item.description: US-93 north at MT-43 East at the top of Lost Trail Pass, on the Idaho-Montana State Line. Turn right on MT-43 for Wisdom and the Big Hole National Battlefield. Continue north on US-93 for Hamilton and Missoula. The welcome to Montana sign is in the background.

item.description: Entering the community of Mayville on OR-19 south.

item.description: Entering Condon on OR-19 south. Condon is the county seat of Gilliam County.

item.description: Entering Baker City on I-84 West. Baker City is the county seat of Baker County, Oregon.

item.title: US-395 South - Kennewick
item.description: Entering Kennewick on US-395 south crossing the Columbia River on the Blue Bridge. Kennewick is one of the tri-cities of Washington, the other two being Pasco and Richland.

item.description: Entering Tonasket on US-97 South.

item.title: US-97 South - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington - The Evergreen State on US-97 south. Taken just south of US Customs at the US-Canadian border.

item.description: Welcome to the United States of America - Oroville, Washington Land Port of Entry at the beginning of US-97 south. Taken at the Canadian-USA boundary.

item.description: Entering Municipality of Hope on TC-1 East. Access to Hope next 4 exits.

item.title: TC-1 East - Abbotsford
item.description: Entering City of Abbotsford on TC-1 East. Abbotsford access next 7 exits.

item.title: BC-99 North - Entering Vancouver
item.description: Entering city of Vancouver on BC-99 north. Vancouver is the largest city in the province of British Columbia and the 8th biggest city in Canada.

item.title: BC-99 North - Delta
item.description: Entering municipality of Delta on BC-99 North. Next three exits have access to Delta.

item.title: BC-99 North - Entering Surrey
item.description: Entering Surrey on BC-99 North. Use next 3 exits on BC-99 for Surrey.

item.title: BC-99 North - Welcome to British Columbia
item.description: Welcome to British Columbia on BC-99 north. Taken just north of Canada Customs.

item.title: I-5 South - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on I-5 south. This sign is right after the onramps from the Exit 276 interchange.

item.title: I-5 South - Welcome To The United States of America
item.description: I-5 South - Welcome To The United States of America at the US-Canada international boundary. Sign is before the Peace Arch Customs station.

item.description: Entering Startup on US-2 west.

item.description: Entering Snohomish County on US-2 west.

item.description: WA-285 North at Wenatchee Ave./Historic Downtown interchange. Entering Wenatchee.

item.title: WA-285 North - Chelan County
item.description: Entering Chelan County on the Columbia River bridge on WA-285 north. Also entering Wenatchee, the county seat of Chelan County.

item.title: US-89 North - Circleville
item.description: Entering Circleville on US-89 north.

item.title: US-30 East - Entering Idaho
item.description: Welcome To Idaho on US-30 East. Entering Payette County.

item.title: ID-21 West - Boise City Limit
item.description: Entering Boise on ID-21 west - Population 205, 671. Boise is the capital of Idaho and the largest city in Idaho.

item.description: Entering Dinosaur, Colorado on CO-64 west.

item.title: CO-64 West - Rangely
item.description: Entering Rangely, Colorado on CO-64 west.

item.title: CO-71 North - Limon
item.description: Entering Limon on CO-71 north. Limon is the county seat of Lincoln County.

item.title: CO-71 North - Punkin Center
item.description: Entering Punkin Center on CO-71 north. Punkin Center is the small community at the junction of CO-71 and CO-94 in Lincoln County.

item.description: Entering the city of Woodland Park on US-24 east.

item.title: US-24 East - Divide and approaching CO-67
item.description: Entering Divide on US-24 east. Also approaching CO-67 south.

item.title: US-24 East/CO-9 South - Hartsel
item.description: Entering Hartsel on US-24 East/CO-9 South.

item.title: CO-82 East - Entering Aspen
item.description: Entering Aspen - Elevation 7908 Feet. Aspen is the county seat of Pitkin County.

item.title: CO-82 East - Basalt
item.description: Entering Basalt on CO-82 east. Basalt is a town in the Roaring Fork Valley, located where the Frying Pan River meets the Roaring Fork.

item.title: US-50 East - Silver Springs
item.description: Entering Silver Springs on US-50 east.

item.title: US-50 East - Stagecoach
item.description: Entering Stagecoach on US-50 east.

item.description: Entering Mound House on US-50 east.

item.description: Entering Carson City - Nevada’s Capital on US-50 east.

item.title: US-50 East At CA-89 South
item.description: US-50 east at CA-89 south/Markleeville/Jackson to CA-88. CA-89 north joins US-50 east to South Lake Tahoe. Entering Meyers.

item.title: CA-89 North - Meyers City Limit
item.description: Meyers City Limit on CA-89 north.

item.title: US-395 South - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California / Mono County Line on US-395 south.

item.title: NV-208 West - Wellington
item.description: Entering Wellington on NV-208 west.

item.title: NV-208 West - Smith
item.description: Entering Smith on NV-208 west.

item.title: AK-9 North - Moose Pass
item.description: Entering the community of Moose Pass on AK-9 North (Seward Highway).

item.title: AK-9 South - Seward
item.description: Seward City Limits on AK-9 South (Seward Highway). Seward is the southern end of the Seward Highway, and is located on the Kenai Peninsula. It is also the southern end of the Alaska Railroad. Seward is named after Abraham Lincoln’s secretary of State - William H. Seward. Secretary Seward negotiated the sale of Alaska from Russia to the United States.

item.title: MT-41 South - Twin Bridges
item.description: Entering Twin Bridges on MT-41 south.

item.title: I-90 West - Yellowstone River / Entering Billings
item.description: I-90 west at the Yellowstone River. Entering Billings. Billings is the largest city in Montana and the county seat of Yellowstone County.

item.title: US-212 West - Lame Deer
item.description: Entering Lame Deer on US-212 west. Lame Deer is the tribal headquarters of the Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation.

item.title: US-212 West - Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation
item.description: US-212 West - Northern Cheyenne Tribe Welcomes You! Please Buckle Up.

item.title: US-212 West - Hammond
item.description: Entering Hammond on US-212 west.

item.title: I-94 West - Welcome To Montana
item.description: Welcome to Montana on I-94 west. Taken at the North Dakota - Montana state line.

item.title: ND-16 South - Beach
item.description: Entering Beach on ND-16 south. Beach is the county of Golden Valley County.

item.title: I-94 East - Welcome To North Dakota
item.description: Welcome to North Dakota on I-94 east. Taken at the Montana - North Dakota state line.

item.title: BL-94 West - Miles City
item.description: Entering Miles City on BL-94 west. Miles City is the county seat of Custer County, and the largest city in eastern Montana.

item.title: US-287 North - Norris
item.description: Entering Norris on US-287 north.

item.title: US-95 North - Entering Weiser
item.description: Entering Weiser on US-95 north. Weiser is the county seat of Washington County. The name of the city is pronounced Weezer.

item.title: ID-34 South - Soda Springs
item.description: Entering Soda Springs on ID-34 south. Population 3058. Soda Springs is the county seat of Caribou County.

item.title: WY-239 West - Entering Freedom
item.description: Entering Freedom on WY-239 west - Elevation 5900; Population 214. Freedom is the oldest community in the Star Valley, and is named because of the settlers who were free to practice polygamy in Wyoming. The western boundary of the town is the Idaho stateline, where at the time had banned polygamy.

item.title: US-89 South - Entering Etna
item.description: Entering Etna on US-89 south. Elevation 5815 Feet; Population 164.

item.title: MT-87 South - Raynolds Pass
item.description: MT-87 at Raynolds Pass - Leaving Montana. The Idaho welcome sign is in the background. An early season snow storm had just passed through the area, leaving wet snow on all of the signs.

item.title: MT-287 South - Virginia City
item.description: Entering Virginia City on MT-287 south. Virginia City is the county seat of Madison County, and was the capitol of Montana Territory from 1865 to 1875.

item.title: MT-41 North - Twin Bridges
item.description: Entering Twin Bridges on MT-41 north.

item.title: ID-29 West - Bannock Pass - Idaho State Line
item.description: Idaho State Line on ID-29 west at Bannock Pass - Elevation 7672 Feet. Bannock Pass is on the Continental Divide located on the Idaho-Montana border.

item.title: ID-28 South - Leadore
item.description: Entering Leadore - Population 105 on ID-28 south.

item.title: US-93 North - Entering Salmon
item.description: Entering Salmon - Population 3,112 on US-93 north. Salmon is the county seat of Lemhi County.

item.title: ID-75 North - Entering Clayton
item.description: Entering Clayton on ID-75 North. Clayton has a population of 7, making it the second smallest city in the state behind Warm River.

item.title: ID-21 East - Entering Stanley
item.description: Entering Stanley on ID-21 East - Population 63. Speed Limit 35 MPH.

item.title: US-101 North - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on US-101 north at the California line.

item.title: US-101 South - Crescent City
item.description: US-101 South - Entering Crescent City. Crescent City is the county seat of Del Norte County.

item.title: US-199 South - Gasquet
item.description: Entering the community of Gasquet on US-199 south.

item.title: NV-88 North - Gardnerville
item.description: Gardnerville - Elevation 4750 Feet on NV-88 North. Approaching NV-756 junction (Centerville Lane) for access to Golf Course.

item.title: NV-88 North - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada - The Silver State on NV-88 north. Taken at the California - Nevada line.

item.title: I-15 South - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on I-15 south at the Idaho-Montana stateline on Monida Pass.

item.title: US-87 South - Black Eagle
item.description: Entering Black Eagle on US-87 south. Black Eagle is an unincorporated community on the north side of Great Falls. The city in the back ground is Great Falls proper.

item.title: US-2 West - Entering Havre
item.description: Entering Havre on US-2 west. Havre is the county seat of Hill County, and the 8th largest city in Montana (as of 2015). Is the largest city on the hi-line in Montana.

item.title: US-2 West - Malta
item.description: Entering Malta on US-2 west. Malta is the county seat of Phillips County.

item.title: MT-42 West - Entering Glasgow
item.description: Entering Glasgow on MT-42 west. Glasgow is the county seat of Valley County.

item.title: MT-24 North - Entering Opheim
item.description: Entering Opheim on MT-24 North.

item.title: MT-5 West - Daniels County
item.description: Entering Daniels County on MT-5 west.

item.title: ND-200 East - Welcome To North Dakota
item.description: Welcome to North Dakota on ND-200 East.

item.title: MT-200 East - Entering Fairview
item.description: Entering Fairview on MT-200 east. Fairview is on the Montana - North Dakota line.

item.title: MT-200 East - Entering Circle
item.description: Entering Circle on MT-200 east. Circle is the county seat of McCone County.

item.title: MT-200 East - Entering Jordan
item.description: Entering Jordan on MT-200 East. Jordan is the county seat of Garfield County, and one of the more isolated towns in the United States. It is 85 miles to Miles City, the nearest sizable city.

item.title: US-191 North - Entering Judith Gap
item.description: Entering Judith Gap on US-191 north.

item.title: US-191 North/BL-90 East - Big Timber
item.description: Entering Big Timber on US-191 North/BL-90 East. Big Timber is the county seat of Sweet Grass County and is situated on the Yellowstone River.

item.title: US-20 East - Welcome To Montana
item.description: Welcome to Montana on US-20 East at Targhee Pass. Targhee Pass is on the Continental Divide. This style of Montana welcome sign is fairly recent. Previous welcome signs were blue, and were cut-out in the state outline.

item.title: US-20 East - Welcome To Montana
item.description: Welcome to Montana on US-20 East at Targhee Pass. Targhee Pass is on the Continental Divide. West of here water flows into the Henrys Fork, the Snake River, and the Columbia River into the Pacific Ocean. East of here water flows into the Madison River, the Missouri River, the Mississippi River into the Gulf of Mexico.

item.title: I-205 North - Entering Washington
item.description: Entering Washington on I-205 north at the Oregon-Washington line on the Columbia River.

item.title: US-20/US-26 East - Entering Boise
item.description: Entering Boise on US-20/US-26 East. Boise is the capital and largest city in Idaho.

item.description: Entering Greenleaf, Population 862 on ID-19 east.

item.description: Entering Adrian on OR-201 south.

item.description: Entering Eureka on US-50 west. Eureka is the county seat of Eureka County, Nevada.

item.title: ID-51 North - Entering Grasmere
item.description: Entering Grasmere on ID-51 north. Grasmere is basically a ghost town. There are some broken down gas pumps and a few abandoned buildings.

item.description: Entering Mountain City on NV-225 North. Elevation 5,609 Feet.

item.description: Welcome to Nevada - The Silver State on NV-233 west. Taken at the Utah-Nevada state line.

item.description: Welcome To Wyoming - Forever West on I-80 west. Taken at the Nebraska-Wyoming state line.

item.description: Nebraska…The Good Life on NE-71 North. Taken at the Colorado-Nebraska stateline.

item.description: Welcome To Colorful Colorado on US-287/US-385 North, at the Oklahoma - Colorado stateline.

item.description: Welcome to Oklahoma - Native America on US-385 north. Taken at the Texas - Oklahoma state line.

item.description: Welcome To Texas on US-87 south. Taken at the New Mexico - Texas state line.

item.description: Welcome To Oklahoma - Native America on OK-325 east. Taken at the New Mexico - Oklahoma state line.

item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - The Land of Enchantment on I-25 south. Taken about two miles south of the Colorado - New Mexico state line.

item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - The Land of Enchantment at Raton Pass.

item.description: Welcome to colorful Colorado on I-70 east. Taken at the Utah-Colorado line.

item.description: Entering Tangent on OR-34 east.

item.description: Entering Union, Oregon on OR-237 north.

item.description: US-95 Spur north at Olds Ferry Jct. Turn right for Olds Ferry; continue north on US-95 Spur for Payette and Weiser. Entering Weiser, Idaho.

item.description: Welcome To Idaho on US-95 Spur North. The Idaho welcome sign is on the Oregon side of the Snake River. The highway crosses the Snake River here into Weiser, Idaho.

item.description: Oregon Thanks You - Come Back Soon on US-95 Spur approaching the Snake River bridge into Idaho.

item.description: Entering Gunnison on US-89 north.

item.description: Entering Tres Piedras on US-64 west.

item.description: Welcome To Colorful Colorado on US-285 north. Taken at the New Mexico/Colorado line.

item.description: Welcome to New Mexico, Land of Enchantment on US-285 south. Taken at the Colorado/New Mexico line.

item.title: NM-460 North - New Mexico State Line
item.description: New Mexico State Line and Anthony, NM city limits on NM-460 north. Taken at the Texas-New Mexico state line on the border between Anthony, NM and Anthony, TX.

item.description: Welcome to Texas on I-10 east. Taken about 1 mile east of the Texas/New Mexico State Line.

item.title: I-10 East - Leaving New Mexico
item.description: Leaving New Mexico - Land of Enchantment on I-10 east. Taken at the Texas - New Mexico state line.

item.title: TX-18 South - Welcome To Texas
item.description: Welcome To Texas on TX-18 south. Taken at the New Mexico State Line.

item.title: TX-18 South - Texas State Line
item.description: Texas State Line on TX-18 south. In the background is the first TX-18 shield, Winkler County Line, and larger Texas welcome sign. Taken at the New Mexico state line.

item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - Land of Enchantment on US-62/US-180 west at the Texas state line.

item.description: Texas State Line on US-62/US-180 East. Entering Gaines County. Also entering Central Time Zone, although that sign is a few yards down.

item.title: US-62/US-180 East - Leaving New Mexico
item.description: You Are Now Leaving New Mexico - The Land of Enchantment on US-62/US-180 east. Taken at the New Mexico/Texas State Line.

item.title: US-54 North - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - Land of Enchantment on US-54 north. US-54 is a divided highway from the Texas line north to Tularosa.

item.description: Welcome to New Mexico on I-10 west. Taken just west of the Texas-New Mexico state line.

item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - Land of Enchantment on I-10 west. Taken at the Texas - New Mexico State Line.

item.description: Welcome to Utah on US-491 north at the Colorado-Utah Border. Also entering San Juan County.

item.description: Leaving New Mexico and Entering Colorado on US-550 North. Many of the exits to New Mexico have the Leaving New Mexico - Hasta La Vista sign. The Welcome To Colorful Colorado is a standard welcome sign. Taken at the New Mexico - Colorado State Line on US-550 north.

item.title: US-491 South - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome To New Mexico - Land of Enchantment on US-491 south. Taken at the Colorado - New Mexico state line.

item.description: Welcome To Nevada on NV-28 east on the north shore of Lake Tahoe.

item.description: Welcome to Nevada on NV-140 east. Taken at the Oregon-Nevada state line.

item.title: OR-140 West - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on OR-140 west. Taken at the Oregon-Nevada State Line.

item.title: US-97 South - Entering Oregon
item.description: Entering Oregon on US-97 south, crossing the Columbia River.

item.title: US-197 South - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on US-197 south in The Dalles. The Oregon welcome sign is about half a mile from the actual state line on the bridge over the Columbia River.

item.title: US-97 North - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on US-97 north. The welcome sign is about a mile north of the actual state line at the Columbia River.

item.title: US-6 West - Welcome to California
item.description: Welcome to California on US-6 west. Taken at the Nevada-California state line. The cattle guard marks the actual state line.

item.title: Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada - The Silver State on NV-319 west. Taken at the Utah-Nevada State Line.

item.title: I-15 North - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome To Arizona on I-15 north at the Nevada-Arizona state line. The larger sign says Arizona: The Grand Canyon State Welcomes You. The smaller sign says Arizona State Line. The smaller sign appears on most Arizona interstates entering or leaving Arizona.

item.title: I-15 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Last distance marker in Nevada on I-15 north. Distance to Littlefield (Arizona), St. George (Utah), and Salt Lake City (Utah). The Arizona Welcome Sign can be seen in the background.

item.title: I-15 South - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome To Nevada on I-15 south. Taken at the Nevada-Arizona State Line. The green Nevada State Line sign in the foreground was placed by the Arizona DOT.

item.title: I-15 South - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome to Arizona on I-15 south at the Arizona-Utah Border. The sign reads Arizona: The Grand Canyon State Welcomes You.

item.title: I-15 South - Arizona State Line
item.description: I-15 south at the Arizona State Line. Taken at the Arizona-Utah state line.

item.title: Welcome To Colorado - US-491 South
item.description: Welcome To Colorado on US-491 South. Taken at the Utah-Colorado state line.

item.title: US-491 South - Dolores County
item.description: Dolores County on US-491 south. The Colorado welcome sign can be seen in the background. Taken at the Utah-Colorado state line.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-30 West
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-30 west. Entering Bear Lake County. Taken at the Wyoming-Idaho Border.

item.title: US-85 North - Belle Fourche
item.description: Entering Belle Fourche on US-85 north. Population 4,565. Belle Fourche is the county seat of Butte County, South Dakota.

item.title: I-90 East - Welcome To South Dakota
item.description: Welcome to South Dakota on I-90 east. Milemarkers for both Wyoming and South Dakota.

item.title: I-90 East - Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome to Wyoming on I-90 East/US-87 South.

item.title: OR-11 South - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on OR-11 south at the Washington-Oregon state line. Also the first speed limit sign in Oregon is in the background - 55 MPH. Most Oregon speed limit signs omit the word Limit.

item.title: Welcome To California - I-40 West
item.description: Welcome to California on I-40 west at the Arizona-California state line crossing the Colorado River. San Bernardino County line.

item.title: I-40 East - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - The Land of Enchantment on I-40 eastbound.

item.title: I-40 East - New Mexico State Line
item.description: New Mexico State Line on I-40 east.

item.title: Welcome To California - US-97 South
item.description: Welcome to California on US-97 south. Siskiyou County Line. Taken at the Oregon-California border.

item.title: Welcome To Utah on UT-30 West
item.description: Welcome to Utah on UT-30 west at the Utah-Wyoming Border. This sign is part of a new series of welcome signs for Utah, in which each region has a unique welcome sign.

item.title: Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome To Wyoming on WY-430 North at the Wyoming-Colorado State Line.

item.title: Welcome To Utah - Browns Park
item.description: Welcome to Utah on CH-1364 (Browns Park Road). This welcome sign was posted by the Utah Division of Wildlife Resources. Continue west on Browns Park Road for US-191.

item.title: Welcome To Colorful Colorado
item.description: Welcome to Colorful Colorado on CO-318 East, at the Utah-Colorado State Line.

item.title: Utah State Line on CR-1364
item.description: Utah State Line on CR-1364 (Browns Park Road) at the Wyoming-Utah Border. There is a cattle guard marking the state line.

item.title: Welcome To Utah on UT-43 West
item.description: Welcome to Utah on UT-43 West. The new Utah welcome signs have a different logo for each region of the State. The logo in this region is a Dinosaur. Taken at the Utah-Wyoming State Line.

item.title: I-80 East - Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome to Wyoming - Forever West, on I-80 east. Taken at the Utah-Wyoming State Line.

item.title: I-80 East - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome to Utah on I-80 east. Each region in Utah has its own type of welcome sign. The welcome sign for the northwestern part of Utah shows a picture of Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-80 East - Utah State Line
item.description: Utah State Line on I-80 east at the Utah-Nevada border. A fancier welcome sign is just east of here. The Utah-Nevada border along I-80 is home to the twin towns of Wendover (Utah) and West Wendover (Nevada). The Nevada side has many large casinos.

item.title: US-93 South - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on US-93 south, at the Idaho-Nevada border.

item.title: US-95 North - Entering McDermitt
item.description: Entering McDermitt - Elevation 4425. McDermitt is located along the Nevada-Oregon border.

item.title: I-15 South - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on I-15 south at the Idaho-Montana stateline on Monida Pass.

item.title: I-15 South - Entering Clark County
item.description: I-15 south Entering Clark Count and Leaving Montana. Taken on Monida Pass on the Continental Divide between Idaho and Montana.

item.title: Welcome To Montana - I-15 North
item.description: Welcome to Montana on I-15 North at the Idaho-Montana state line on Monida Pass. Monida Pass is the Continental Divide.

item.title: ID-61 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-61 north. The Wyoming milemarker for WY-89 is attached to the sign.

item.title: WY-89 South - Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome To Wyoming On WY-89 South. This is the new style of welcome sign in Wyoming. Taken on the Wyoming-Idaho border.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-91 North
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-91 North.

item.title: I-84 East - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome to Utah on I-84 east at the Utah-Idaho state line.

item.title: US-95 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-95 north at the Oregon-Idaho State Line.

item.title: US-95 North - Oregon Thanks You
item.description: Oregon Thanks You Come Back Soon on US-95 north.

item.title: US-50 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on US-50 west at the California-Nevada state line. Entering South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-10 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on I-10 West/US-95 north, just west of the California State Agricultural Inspection Station. Entering Pacific Time Zone.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 243
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 243 - Riviera Drive. Taken upon leaving the California State Agricultural Inspection Station.

item.title: I-10 West - California State Line
item.description: California State Line on I-10 west crossing the Colorado River, at the Arizona-California Border.

item.title: AZ-78 West - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome to Arizona on AZ-78 west at the Arizona-New Mexico State Line.

item.title: NM-78 East - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico on NM-78 east. Begin DOT Maintenance.

item.title: I-10 East - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico on I-10 east. Taken at the Arizona-New Mexico State Line.

item.title: I-8 East - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: I-8 east - Welcome To Arizona. The welcome sign is about a mile inside of Arizona after Exit 1. There is a smaller welcome sign on the Colorado River bridge at the actual state line.

item.title: I-8 East - Arizona State Line
item.description: Arizona State Line, Yuma County Line, and Yuma City Limits on the Colorado River bridge at the Arizona-California State Line.

item.title: I-80 East - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome To Nevada on I-80 east at the California-Nevada state line. I-80 through Nevada is called the Purple Heart Trail.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - ID-6 East
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-6 east.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - ID-8 East
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-8 east. Entering Moscow. Moscow is home to the University of Idaho.

item.title: WA-274 - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on WA-274 west.

item.title: AZ-82 East - Entering Patagonia
item.description: Entering Patagonia on AZ-82 East. Elevation 4,050. Founded in 1898.

item.title: I-10 East - Pima County Line
item.description: Entering Pima County on I-10 east. Also entering the town of Marana. Taken on the Pima-Pinal County Line.

item.title: US-93 South - Entering Wickenburg
item.description: Entering Wickenburg on US-93 South. Elevation 2,093 Feet. Founded 1863.

item.title: Welcome To Arizona on I-10 East
item.description: Welcome to Arizona on I-10 east.

item.title: I-10 East - Arizona State Line
item.description: Arizona State Line on I-10 east on the Colorado River bridge. Mile 0 marker is attached to the sign.

item.title: I-84 West - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on I-84 west at the Utah border.

item.title: End CO-90 at the Utah State Line
item.description: End CO-90 west at the Utah State Line. CO-90 continues as UT-46 into Utah.

item.title: NM-597 - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico on NM-597, at US-160.

item.title: US-89 South - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome to Arizona on US-89 south at the Utah-Arizona line.

item.title: Welcome To Oregon - US-95 North
item.description: Welcome To Oregon on US-95 North at the Nevada border.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-2 East
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-2 east. The Idaho welcome sign is about a half mile away from the Washington-Idaho state line.

item.title: US-2 West - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on US-2 west at ID-41 jct. Use ID-41 south for Spirit Lake and Coeur d’Alene. US-2 west for Newport and Spokane.

item.title: WA-290 West - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on WA-290 west. Taken at the Idaho-Washington border.

item.title: I-15 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on I-15 North at the Utah/Idaho border.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-195 South
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-195 south. US-195 ends at US-95 just south of here.

item.title: US-12 West - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-12 west at Lolo Pass. Entering Pacific Time Zone.

item.title: Welcome To Oregon - OR-86
item.description: Welcome to Oregon at the Snake River on OR-86. The Entering Adams County sign is deceptive, we are actually leaving Adams County (ID) and entering Baker County (OR).

item.title: ID-71 South - Idaho State Line
item.description: Idaho State Line on ID-71 south. This is a non standard state line sign.

item.title: CO-71 South - Welcome To Colorado
item.description: Welcome to Colorado on CO-71 South at the Nebraska-Colorado border.

item.title: NE-88 East - Welcome To Nebraska
item.description: Welcome To Nebraska on NE-88 east.

item.title: WY-151 West - Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome to Wyoming on WY-151 west at the Nebraska border.

item.title: I-84 West - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on I-84 west at the ID-OR state line. The welcome sign on this border has an Oregon Trail theme.

item.title: US-101 North - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on US-101 north at the California line.

item.title: Welcome To Alberta on ABS-501 West
item.description: Welcome To Alberta on ABS-501 west at Saskatchewan border.

item.title: I-80 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome To California, I-80 west. Milemarker 0 designates Mile 0 for Nevada.

item.title: CA-186 North - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on CA-186 north, just north of US Customs.

item.title: I-8 West - Welcome To California
item.description: I-8 west at Welcome To California/Entering Pacific Time Zone just west of Arizona line.

item.title: UT-30 East - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome to Utah on UT-30 east at the Nevada line

item.title: NV-292 - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on NV-292

item.description: Welcome To Alberta - Wild Rose Country on AB-3 east

item.title: NM-511 South - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome To New Mexico on NM-511 South at the NM-CO Line.

item.description: Welcome To Delaware on DE-303 East.

item.description: Welcome To Virginia on I-95 South

item.title: MD-60 South - Welcome To Maryland
item.description: Welcome to Maryland on MD-60 South at the Pennsylvania border. This is the Mason-Dixon Line.

item.title: PA-316 North - Welcome To Pennsylvania
item.description: Welcome To Pennsylvania, Franklin County, Washington Township on PA-316 North at the Maryland border.

item.description: Welcome To New Hampshire on I-95 North.

item.description: Welcome To New Hampshire on US-2 West.

item.description: Welcome To Nebraska on I-80 East at Wyoming Border

item.description: Leaving Kansas Come Again Sign on KS-27 North at Nebraska Border

item.description: Welcome To Kansas, on KS-27 South at Nebraska Border

item.description: Welcome To Nevada on I-80 West, Nevada-Utah Border

item.description: US-50 east at the California-Nevada state line.

item.description: Welcome To South Dakota, SD-75 South

item.description: Arizona Welcome Sign on AZ-389 East in Colorado City, Arizona. Taken at the Utah-Arizona line.

item.description: Welcome To Wyoming On I-80 East

item.description: Welcome To Utah on UT-16 North

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-20/US-26 East
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-26/US-20 East

item.title: I-15 North - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: Welcome to Arizona on I-15 north. This is also the boundary between Pacific and Mountain Time Zone, during standard time. Arizona does not observe Daylight Savings Time, so when DST is active Nevada and Arizona are on the same time.

item.title: US-395 South - Welcome To California
item.description: California Welcome Sign on US-395 South

item.title: US-95 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-95 North at the Oregon/Idaho border.

item.title: US-95 South - Welcome to Nevada
item.description: Welcome To Nevada on US-95 South at the Nevada-Oregon border.

item.title: ID-61 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-61 North at the Idaho/Wyoming Border.

item.title: US-91 South - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome To Utah on US-91 South. This was taken before the Salt Lake Olympics. Currently, Utah still uses the same style of Welcome Sign.

item.title: WY-89 South - Welcome To Wyoming
item.description: Welcome To Wyoming On WY-89 South. This is an older style of welcome sign in Wyoming. The newer signs have a picture of Devils Tower.

item.title: ID-1 South - Welcome To USA and Idaho
item.description: Welcome To the United States of America and Welcome TO Idaho on ID-1 South

item.title: US-730 West - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on US-730 west at the Oregon-Washington state line. The Columbia River is to the right side of the photo.

item.title: MT-200 East - Welcome To Montana
item.description: Welcome To Montana, MT-200 East, ID-MT Border

item.title: ID-66 South - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome To Idaho on ID-66 South, ID-WA Border

item.title: ID-6 East - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Idaho Welcome Sign on ID-6 East, ID-WA Border. This style of welcome sign was standard from around 1990 up until 1998.

item.title: WA-272 West - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington - The Evergreen State on WA-272 West.
